page.title: 01Contents: Rosneath & Rhu
page.content: Rosneath was a rural area which is taking on an urban appearance due to the presence of the MOD. Information on Rosneath begins with attitudes to changes in area and goes on to describe ecology, education, em- ployment, farming, home life, housing, industry, landscape, life styles, local history, population, recreation, religion, supernatural, tourism, trade and transport in l985. Mention of Rhu can be found under armed forces, landscape, local history trade, transport, tourism & recreation. Losing identity as village with spread of housing and being sucked into town of Helensburgh.
